mapper.insert: insert into BASE_PERSON (PERSON_CODE, PERSON_NAME, POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, IMG_HEAD, TOTAL_SCORE, TOTAL_GRADING) values (#{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalGrading,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

PERSON_CODE,

mapper.update:
update BASE_PERSON
PERSON_NAME = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_NAME = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG_HEAD = #{imgHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_GRADING = #{totalGrading,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PERSON_CODE = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update BASE_PERSON set PERSON_NAME = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_NAME = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_HEAD = #{imgHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_GRADING = #{totalGrading,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PERSON_CODE = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
